settings.text:
Personalization is what makes your online store stand out among thousands of generic digital storefronts. With our customers in mind, we truly understand the power of personalization and turned it into a service. 

Select one of the following website personalization services that could meet your current business needs and budget.

settings.title: Self-sufficient
settings.subtitle: Template download cost:
settings.text:
• ✅ Customize any template from our portfolio yourself
  • ✅ Adapt colors, fonts, blocks to your liking
  • ✅ Upload text and images with your products
  • ✅ Integrate social networks
  • ✅ Get an optimized mobile version
  • ❌ Installing the Direct Delivery Module
  • ❌ Installing the FAQ module
  • ❌ Connecting pop-ups
  • ❌ Filling the store with 10 customer products
  • ❌ Adding Animation Elements
  • ❌ Module installation Delivery
  • ❌ Setting the subheading “Thank you for paying”
  • 📝 Possibility of making edits: 0
